title: Magnus Carlsen
description: Norwegian grandmaster, former World Chess Champion, highest-rated player in history.

title: Fabiano Caruana
description: Italian-American grandmaster, contender for the World Chess Championship.

title: Hikaru Nakamura
description: American grandmaster, blitz specialist, and popular streamer.

title: Viswanathan Anand
description: Indian grandmaster, former World Chess Champion, legendary rapid player.

title: Gukesh D
description: Indian grandmaster, youngest player to reach 2700 Elo.

title: Wesley So
description: Filipino-American grandmaster, former U.S. Champion and elite rapid/blitz player.

title: Alireza Firouzja
description: Iranian-French grandmaster, one of the top young talents in the world.

title: Garry Kasparov
description: Former World Chess Champion, Russian grandmaster, considered one of the greatest players of all time.

title: Bobby Fischer
description: American grandmaster and 11th World Chess Champion, famous for winning the 1972 match against Boris Spassky.

title: Judit Polgar
description: Hungarian grandmaster, considered the strongest female chess player in history.

title: Sagar Shah
description: Indian international Master, popular chess content creator and educator.
